game_name: Copy Cat -- multiplayer drawing, card, and word games
game_description: Supports up to 8 players. Take turns drawing and guessing each other's creations in a relaxing VR environment!
review_1: The environments are really nice. They actually just changed the home area completely and added a little archery section if you wanna shoot some targets while you wait. I've only been able to play a couple of rounds of the drawing game due to not having friends with VR. It worked really well and showed me everything I needed to see. Hopefully I can catch a public game and really get into it.
review_2: This app is a breath of fresh air compared to some of the other social/hangout games! The games are fun and the worlds are really beautiful. I had a great time playing the drawing game with my friends! I saw new games were coming soon, Iâ€™ll def be back to check those out.
review_3: I had a great time playing games in here with a group of friends. They have a few different game options and each game transports you to a totally different environment... we went from a gorgeous home to a tropical beach and then the forest! My favorite was for sure the drawing game. I will def be back!
review_4: Fun to play competitive games with others while hanging in a multiple different relaxing spaces!
review_5: A couple of simple but fun party games you can play while chatting with your friends or making new ones.
